channel.title: Error message when trying to buy BAY through website
channel.description:
I've just tried using the * [Buy $BAY] button at the top of the website and I received an error box pop up and couldn't go any further. Here is the error box ![31|465x500](upload://mgaQJGjsGFWbH82sSHQ7NWpqjcr.jpeg)
I tried using the support button on the website and the person just said go use another web browser, which i did and got the same message. I've tried chrome, explorer and firefox all get the same message.
Anything you guys can do about this?

item.title: Error message when trying to buy BAY through website
